column1: Lending Club historical data from 2007 to 2011
- Please note that the data we have downloaded does not require registering for an account.  Some of the most important features such as Fico score range
column2: “bc_util” (ratio of total current balance to high credit/credit limit for all bankcard accounts)
column3: education and marital status are not available in this data.  If you would like to explore the full data
column5: you would need to register with Lending Club.
